DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the feasibility of closing bronchopleural fistulas with devices originally developed for correction of cardiac septal defects deployed through bronchoscopic procedures.
DOC.brief_title: Bronchoscopic Closure of Bronchopleural Fistulas With Occlutech Figulla ASD N Occluder Device
DOC.criteria: Patients over 14 years old Bronchopleural fistulas Clinical conditions increasing surgical risk (hemodynamic instability, respiratory distress) Immunosuppressed patients Acute intense inflammatory process in fistula edge Suppurative pleural cavity infection
